name: The Horrors of More
description: Hi, I am one of developers of "The Horrors of More" Liu Binpeng. "The Horrors of More" is made by Paige Lehmkuhl, Phil Beyer ,and me.  Player needs to download all cards and point sheet. Every main card amount is depended on the players number. Three players need 15 pieces for each  main card. Last, the only suggestion I can give players is "Pay attention for your pollution points!"
